metadata.name: COE_01
metadata.description: The first chromatic poster of Curves of Emotions series. Woman, the most beautiful artwork created by the creator. A woman is the gates of the body, and the gates of the soul. She is imperfect, permanently and inevitably flawed. And she is beautiful. By choosing healthy over skinny a woman chooses love over self judgement. For you, something that accentuates the curves looks sexy. It can be a dress, it can be jeans, it can be a tank top, it can be nude, who cares!
